value:
$nMEID_ヴェロニカ|We are the Embla Pirates. Surrender
your treasure, if you want to live...

$nMPID_マークス|The pirate is the very antithesis
of the knight. This is uncharted
territory for me.

$nMEID_ヴェロニカ|To see Xander dressed so differently
is strange, but...in a way, encouraging.

$nMEID_ヴェロニカ|What am I supposed to do next?
Search for treasure, or some such?

$nMPID_マークス|I'm not going to take the pirate act
overboard. Swimming is not my
strong suit.

$nMEID_ヴェロニカ|I am Veronica, pirate princess. Your
friend $Nf is a
member of my crew...

$nMEID_ヴェロニカ|A princess among pirates...
I could get used to the idea.

$nMPID_マークス|Who would have thought that playing
the part of a pirate would become
so enjoyable?
$nMPID_マークス|The price of freedom, I suppose.
$nMEID_ヴェロニカ|I get what I want. As a pirate should.

I am Veronica, Princess of Embla.
Xander here will explain why we
are dressed as pirates.

$nMPID_マークス|So, Princess Veronica, have you
learned what it is to be a pirate?$k$p$nMEID_ヴェロニカ|To live without limits. To sail upon
the open sea, free from rules
and regulations.$k$pThe yearning for that freedom is the
idea behind this festival. That much,
at least, I can grasp.$k$p$nMPID_マークス|It is good for a leader to have a firm
understanding of all walks of life.$k$p$nMEID_ヴェロニカ|True enough. Then I will indulge
in this freedom a while longer...
それ…
沈めるわ
うあっ…
Not bad...
$nMPID_二人|You're ours!
$nMPID_二人|Your life is forfeit! We mean you no harm.
$nMEID_ヴェロニカ|Meet your end.
$nMPID_マークス|Ah, plunder!
How precocious...
Am I being punished...?
Take care.
I am at your side.

"Xander..."
"Leave it to me."

"I'll handle this."
"'We'll handle this,' you mean."
Sigh...

"Let's take to the high seas!"
"But...I cannot swim."
Ah! Our target.
Consider them plundered.
What a pity...for them.
$nMEID_ヴェロニカ|Xander...
$nMPID_マークス|Yes, Princess Veronica? What is it?
$nMEID_ヴェロニカ|These clothes...

$nMPID_マークス|Ah, yes. This is the garb of pirates from
another world. It seems that there's a
festival on, and this is the costume.

$nMEID_ヴェロニカ|Why are we pirates? ...Is it supposed
to be fun?

$nMPID_マークス|Perhaps not fun, per se, but...consider
this: your people will take heart to
see you throw yourself into the role.

They live lives of hardship, day after
day. This will bring them joy.

$nMEID_ヴェロニカ|Embla holds festivals too. I know
the people do enjoy them...

I've never participated, just watched.
And without my brother...I don't
know what to do.

$nMPID_マークス|There is no need to fret, Princess
Veronica. Instead, view today as an
opportunity to learn.
$nMEID_ヴェロニカ|Learn what exactly?

$nMPID_マークス|Well, to lead the people, you must
come to understand them.$k$pHow better to understand the
commonfolk than join their
celebrations?

$nMEID_ヴェロニカ|You're right, Xander. But…what about
right NOW? I still don't know a
thing about pirates.

$nMPID_マークス|Er, well... Now that you mention it, I
know little of them myself.$k$pBut that is inconsequential! Let us
find someone who does and inquire.

The Order of Heroes has summoned
so many to Askr. Why, some may
even be pirates themselves!

$nMEID_ヴェロニカ|Is that so? Hmm. I suppose talking
to them could be fun.

$nMPID_マークス|*chuckle* Well then! Take my arm,
Princess, and let us be off!
